P1.1.6 â€” Stop/Shutdown Semantics (Phase 1 Graceful Exit)

Commands executed:

1) Normal shutdown:
   cd /library
   PYTHONPATH=. python3 lillycore/run_runtime.py | tee lillycore/docs/build/outputs/p1.1.6/normal_shutdown.log
   Action: typed "stop" at prompt

2) Negative-path shutdown (forced shutdown error):
   cd /library
   FORCE_SHUTDOWN_ERROR=1 PYTHONPATH=. python3 lillycore/run_runtime.py | tee lillycore/docs/build/outputs/p1.1.6/negative_shutdown.log
   Action: typed "stop" at prompt
